actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1501.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the messages of the President of September 20, 1974 (H. Doc. 93-361), October 4, 1974 (H. Doc. 93-365) and November 13, 1974 (H. Doc. 93-387), transmitted pursuant to section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Rescinds specified budget authority for college housing, the Bureau of Land Management, the National Park Service, the Forest Service, and the Appalachian Regional Development Programs, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act, as requested in Presidential messages for the Departments of Housing and Urban Development, Interior, and Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the messages of the President of September 20, 1974 (H. Doc. 93-361), October 4, 1974 (H. Doc. 93-365) and November 13, 1974 (H. Doc. 93-387), transmitted pursuant to section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
